data.fullContent: Automotive engineering applies principles of engineering and materials sciences toward the design, manufacture, and operation of motor vehicles. The industry employs thousands of workers and produces products used in every part of the world. Despite the advances made in computer technology and automated manufacturing systems, the industry is and will continue to be heavily dependent on the work of automotive engineers. Automotive engineers are found in many related fields, such as robotics and traffic control. In addition to designing, building, and maintaining motor vehicles, automotive engineers work in the areas of product development, quality control, manufacturing management, and sales and marketing. In order to be a successful automotive engineer, one must be able to solve mechanical and mathematical problems, understand the needs of both management and customers, and communicate with all levels of the company.

q1.translation: 汽车工程将工程学和材料科学的原理应用于汽车的设计、制造和操作。该行业雇佣了数千名工人，生产的产品应用于世界各地。尽管计算机技术和自动化制造系统取得了进步，但汽车工业现在和将来仍将严重依赖汽车工程师的工作。
q1.front: Automotive engineering applies principles of engineering and materials sciences toward the design, manufacture, and operation of motor vehicles. The industry employs thousands of workers and produces products used in every part of the world. Despite the advances made in computer technology and automated manufacturing systems, the industry is and will continue to be heavily dependent on the work of automotive engineers.
q1.content: Automotive engineering applies principles of ____ and materials sciences toward the ____, manufacture, and ____ of motor vehicles. The industry ____ thousands of workers and produces products used in every ____ of the ____. Despite the advances ____ in computer technology and automated manufacturing systems, the industry is and will ____ to be heavily dependent on the work of automotive engineers.

q2.translation: 汽车工程将工程学和材料科学的原理应用于汽车的设计、制造和操作。该行业雇佣了数千名工人，生产的产品应用于世界各地。尽管计算机技术和自动化制造系统取得了进步，但汽车工业现在和将来仍将严重依赖汽车工程师的工作。汽车工程师在许多相关领域，如机器人和交通控制。除了设计、制造和维护汽车，汽车工程师还在产品开发、质量控制、制造管理、销售和营销等领域工作。为了成为一名成功的汽车工程师，一个人必须能够解决机械和数学问题，理解管理层和客户的需求，并与公司的各级沟通。
q2.front: Automotive engineering applies principles of engineering and materials sciences toward the design, manufacture, and operation of motor vehicles. The industry employs thousands of workers and produces products used in every part of the world. Despite the advances made in computer technology and automated manufacturing systems, the industry is and will continue to be heavily dependent on the work of automotive engineers.
q2.middle: Automotive engineers are found in many related fields, such as robotics and traffic control.
q2.ending: In addition to designing, building, and maintaining motor vehicles, automotive engineers work in the areas of product development, quality control, manufacturing management, and sales and marketing. In order to be a successful automotive engineer, one must be able to solve mechanical and mathematical problems, understand the needs of both management and customers, and communicate with all levels of the company.

options.sentence: Electrical engineers use drawings to assist in designing new items as well as to help make improvements and repairs to existing items.
Automotive engineers are found in many related fields, such as robotics and traffic control.
Some mechanical engineers move on to become project managers, and some even become managers themselves.

options.sentence: Companies are involved in research and development as a cost-effective way to test new technologies.
Many people are still using automobiles today because they have a lot of benefits such as safety, convenience, and cost savings.
Automotive engineers must be able to solve mechanical and mathematical problems, understand the needs of customers and management, and communicate with all levels of a company.
Air pollution from automobile use can cause damage to the environment, but today's cars have been designed to reduce these impacts.
